Package index

Core Functions

countPwmMatches()
Count the matches to a PWM within an XStringSet
getClusterMatches() countClusterMatches()
Find matches from a PWM cluster within an XStringSet
getPwmMatches()
Find all PWM matches within an XStringSet
testClusterEnrich()
Test enrichment across a cluster of motifs using a background set of sequences
testClusterPos()
Test positional bias motifs within a cluster
testMotifEnrich()
Test motif enrichment using a background set of sequences
testMotifPos()
Test for a Uniform Distribution across a set of best matches
clusterMotifs()
Assign each motif to a cluster
makeRMRanges()
Form a set of random, matching ranges for bootstrapping or permuting
plotMatchPos()
Plot Motif Match Positions

Data Objects

ar_er_peaks
A set of peaks with AR and ER detected
ar_er_seq
Sequences from peaks with AR and ER detected
ex_pfm
Example Position Frequency Matrices
hg19_mask
Regions from hg19 with high N content
zr75_enh
Candidate Enhancer Regions from ZR-75-1 Cells
